description: Creates a named query in the specified workgroup. Requires that you have access to the workgroup.

parameters.name: Database
parameters.description: The database to which the query belongs.

parameters.name: QueryString
parameters.description: The contents of the query with all query statements.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive string used to ensure the request to create the query is idempotent (executes only once). If another CreateNamedQuery request is received, the same response is returned and another query is not created. If a parameter has changed, for example, the QueryString, an error is returned. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: NamedQueryId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the query.
